title: Pokemon: Utae Meloetta - Rinka no Mi wo Sagase!
synopsis: Meloetta has throat trouble, Pikachu and Snivy search for the Rinka Berries for her throat cure. Meowth and Wobbuffet run after Meloetta.
staff: [['Koga, Kazuomi', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Tajiri, Satoshi', ['Original Creator']], ['Sugimori, Ken', ['Original Character Design']]]
